result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin Duane Burnham

records.addlTxt:
Final pre-trial on November 16, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Jury trial - 12 person on November 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:59 AM Cases 22CM1 and 22CF185 called together.  Defendant Justin Duane Burnham in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court for Justin Duane Burnham.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Cases on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: def wants to see crime lab results, asking for a 1 day trial date.
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on October 6, 2022 at 10:45 am.

2:37 PM Cases 22CF185 and 22CM01 called together.  Defendant Justin Duane Burnham in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court for Justin Duane Burnham.  Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case 22CF185 on for Arraignment.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of information, def. waives reading.  Court informs def. of charges, possible penalties and rights.  NG plea entered to all counts.  Atty Chapman notes def is facing revocation on another matter.  No speedy trial demand at this time.
Status conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 10:45 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Justin Duane Burnham
Current: 11100 Crosstown Rd, Grantsburg, WI 54840   (Effective: 08-04-2022)
Prior: 14337 Park Rd. Lot#44, Grantsburg, WI 54840
Status conference on August 25, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

1:36 PM Cases 22CF185 and 22CM01 called together.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Justin Duane Burnham appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court for Justin Duane Burnham.  Def waives all in person hearing KIV.  Cases on for an Initial Appearance.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of complaints, waives reading.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights.  NG pleas to misdemeanor charges.  WTLPH; prepared to waive prelim today.  Case 22CF185 proceeds to Waiver of Preliminary Hearing:  Court informs def of rights to PH; waived by def.  Court finds waiver of right to PH knowingly, freely, voluntarily made.  Court finds factual basis for bind over.  State files information.   Bond continues.
Arraignment scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Initial appearance on August 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Bond to cover 22CM01 and 22GF209.  No use or possession of any illegal drugs, paraphernalia, or controlled substances without a valid prescription. Subject to random testing of breath, blood or urine by any law enforcement or corrections officer upon arrest or reasonable suspicion.

01:19 PM Defendant Justin Duane Burnham not in court.  Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant fails to appear.  Atty Schmidt and Court by video.  Upon def's failure to appear, State requests warrant.  Court orders warrant, $250 cash bond on warrant.  State asks for $330.50.  Court amends bond on warrant to $330.50.
